script.title: cpu-usage-60.slax
script.author: phil
script.synopsis: Cool display of CPU usage graphically, similar to Cisco's "show processes cpu history"
script.description: This op script uses get-accounting-record-information to collect RE CPU usage for the last 60 minutes and display them in graphical format. It can be similarly modified to display router temperature, rtt details, memory usage, etc as well.

example.title: Configuration
example.description: Configuration required for this op script
